mapper.select: select c.* from contents as c join follow as f on (c.user_id = f.follow_id) where f.follower_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into contents (content_val, user_id, timestamp, hashtag, location_name, lat, lng) values (#{content_val}, #{user_id}, now(), #{hashtag}, #{location_name}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: select max(content_id) as content_id from contents where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update contents set content_val = #{content_val}, hashtag = #{hashtag}, location_name = #{location_name}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng} where content_id = #{content_id}
mapper.select: select content_id from contents where dislike >= 20
